description: These vegan breakfast sandwiches are absolutely delicious and super satisfying! Made with "eggy" chickpea flour patties, smoky tempeh bacon, and spicy cashew cheese, they're loaded with flavor and great for make-ahead breakfasts.
name: Eggy Vegan Breakfast Sandwiches
recipeIngredient: 1 cup raw cashews, (soaked in water 4 to 8 hours, drained and rinsed)
2 tablespoons vinegar-based hot sauce (such as Cholula), plus more, to taste)
2 tablespoons unsweetened and unflavored non-dairy milk, (plus more as needed)
1/4 teaspoon Kala namak (for eggy flavor, can substitute table salt)
1 tablespoon olive oil (or high-heat oil of choice)
Additional fillings or sauces of choice, such as salsa, ketchup, sliced vegan cheese, avocado, etc.

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients into the bowl of a food processor fitted with an s-blade. Blend until smooth.
Taste-test the mixture and adjust the seasonings to your liking. Thin the mixture with additional milk if it seems too thick. Blend again.
